body.p: A respondent to the ED noted that the final sentence of the definition of vesting conditions, which states that “a performance condition might include a market condition”, is contradictory. This is because a market condition:

li.p: is a target that is related to the market price of the entity’s equity instruments; and
includes no explicit requirement for the counterparty to complete a specified period of service.
